page.title: 10RELIGION (PENTECOSTAL)
page.content: This Church is so named as it was formed at Pentecost. It was built in 1950 and the current Pastor,{Mr. {Pickering}has been there since 1970. An average of 50 people a week worship there. Apart from services the Church also holds a{Sunday School}between 14:45 and 16:30 on Sunday afternoons, and another group known as{'Young {Folks'}meet on alternate Friday evenings at 19:15. There are about a dozen members and the evenings consist of quizzes, visits and chorus singing. Other events during the week include a{Bible Study}and{Prayer {Meeting}on Tuesday and a Ladies' Meeting once a month on Thursday. Every Sunday morning there is the {'Breaking of Bread'}Service, and another service is held in the evening.
